AllowOffPremUsage.description: This setting controls whether the device can function when off-premise or whether all traffic will be blocked
AllowOffPremUsage.title: Allows the device to function off-premise

BlockOnUnsuccessfulConnection.description: This setting controls whether or not requests should be automatically blocked on failure to contact the iboss cloud
BlockOnUnsuccessfulConnection.title: Block on connection failure

CaptivePortalCheckViaProxy.description: Send the captive portal check through the iboss gateway
CaptivePortalCheckViaProxy.title: Captive Portal via Proxy

CategorizationSubmittedURLsMaxLen.description: Trim a URI-encoded URL to at most this many bytes, before submitting for categorization.
CategorizationSubmittedURLsMaxLen.title: Categorization-Submitted URLs Maximum Length

ChromeBridgeIP.description: Addresses chrome is using for internal bridge
ChromeBridgeIP.title: IP address of Chrome Bridge

CompatibilityAppMode.description: This setting controls whether the iboss Cloud web server will operate in 'pac' or 'proxy' mode
CompatibilityAppMode.title: Cloud Web Server Mode

CompatibilityAppPluginID.description: Set if not using the production default
CompatibilityAppPluginID.title: Cloud Web Server ID

FilterPerformance.description: This setting defines the filtering performance and consequently the number of filtering calls that the extension will generate. Acceptable values are HIGH, MEDIUM, or LOW.
FilterPerformance.title: Ability to define the filtering performance to apply

FilterWhenOffPrem.description: This setting controls whether the device will filter when it is off-premise or allow all traffic to pass
FilterWhenOffPrem.title: Turns filtering on/off when off-premise

GatewayLoadBalancing.description: Enable advanced gateway load balancing based on user geo.
GatewayLoadBalancing.title: Gateway Load Balancing

Gen3AlwaysMobile.description: sets the agent to run in mobile mode always
Gen3AlwaysMobile.title: sets the agent to run in mobile mode always

Gen4AutoLoginCaptivePortalDetection.description: feature switch to turn on captive portal detection
Gen4AutoLoginCaptivePortalDetection.title: Gen4 Captive Portal Detection

Gen4AutoLoginComputerOverridesUser.title: Gen4 Auto Login Computer Overrides User

Gen4AutoLoginEncryptionRegistration.description: a boolean flag to enable to encrypt the registration call string
Gen4AutoLoginEncryptionRegistration.title: Gen4 Auto Login Encryption Registration

Gen4AutoLoginRegistrationInterval.description: interval to re-register on configured interval
Gen4AutoLoginRegistrationInterval.title: Gen4 Auto Login Registration Interval

Gen4AutoLoginSecurityGroups.description: Security Groups a newly registered device will be placed in (comma separated list)
Gen4AutoLoginSecurityGroups.title: Gen4 Auto Login Security Groups

Gen4AutoRegisterPort.description: Agent registration port for Auto Login mode
Gen4AutoRegisterPort.title: Gen4 Auto Login Register Port

Gen4AutoRegisterSecurePort.description: Agent registration port for Auto Login mode
Gen4AutoRegisterSecurePort.title: Gen4 Auto Login Register Secure Port

Gen4ProxyAutoConfigurationScriptURL.description: Use a Proxy Auto Configuration Script (still requires Proxy Host to be set)
Gen4ProxyAutoConfigurationScriptURL.title: Gen4 Proxy Auto Configuration Script URL

Gen4ProxyBypass.description: A list of servers which will bypass the proxy connection
Gen4ProxyBypass.title: Gen4 Proxy Bypass

Gen4ProxyHost.description: This is the hostname of your assigned iboss Cloud or off-premise accessible iboss filter
Gen4ProxyHost.title: Gen4 Proxy Host

Gen4ProxyMonitorInterval.description: interval to monitor the proxy setting
Gen4ProxyMonitorInterval.title: Gen4 Auto Login Proxy Monitor Interval

Gen4ProxyPort.description: This is the proxy port of your assigned iboss Cloud or off-premise accessible iboss filter
Gen4ProxyPort.title: Gen4 Proxy Port

HTTPPort.description: This is the assigned the http port which the iboss filter runs on
HTTPPort.title: HTTP Port

HTTPSPort.description: This is the assigned the https port which the iboss filter runs on
HTTPSPort.title: HTTPS Port

PACFetchInterval.description: Interval to fetch PAC update in seconds
PACFetchInterval.title: PAC Fetch Interval

PACFetchTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds for retrieving the PAC from the gateway.
PACFetchTimeout.title: PAC Fetch Timeout

PolicyUpdateDetection.description: feature switch to turn on policy update detection
PolicyUpdateDetection.title: Policy Update Detection

ProxyBypassDomains.description: This contains list of domains to be bypassed.
ProxyBypassDomains.title: Proxy Bypass Domains

ReloadTabs.title: Reload browser tabs at start up

RunTimeMode.description: This setting controls whether the iboss Cloud Connector will operate in 'normal', 'gen4_saml', or 'gen4_auto' mode
RunTimeMode.title: Cloud Connector Mode

SAMLSessionCookie.description: SAML Session Cookie used by Gen4 SAML mode connections
SAMLSessionCookie.title: SAML Session Cookie

SSOBackupHost.description: This is the hostname of your local filter to be used as a backup in case the primary filter that processes SSO login requests goes down
SSOBackupHost.title: SSO Backup Host

SSOHost.description: This is the hostname of your local filter used to process SSO login requests
SSOHost.title: SSO Host

SSOLoginIntervalMinutes.description: This setting controls the interval time (in minutes) when the SSO Login request should be sent to update the IP Address of the user
SSOLoginIntervalMinutes.title: The SSO Login Interval

SSOSecurityKey.description: The SSOSecurity Key specifying which group requests that originate from this App should target for SSO login purposes.
SSOSecurityKey.title: SSOSecurity Key.

SendCompleteEmail.description: For all requests if this is set to true the complete email will be sent otherwise just the prefix will be sent
SendCompleteEmail.title: Send Complete Email

UseSSL.description: This setting controls whether the iboss will connect to the On/Off Prem Hosts via SSL/HTTPS or standard HTTP
UseSSL.title: Use SSL

WebSecurityCustomBlockPageURL.description: This is the url of an optional custom block page to use instead of the default internal block page
WebSecurityCustomBlockPageURL.title: WebSecurity Custom Block Page URL

WebSecurityHost.description: This is the hostname of your assigned iboss Cloud or off-premise accessible iboss filter
WebSecurityHost.title: WebSecurity Host

WebSecurityKey.description: The Security Key specifying which group requests that originate from this App should target for web security filtering.
WebSecurityKey.title: WebSecurity Key.
